original_title: Steve Hughes: Live in Toomler, Amsterdam
overview: I'm from Sydney, Australia, I've played and founded Thrash band Slaughter Lord in Australia, and played for Mortal Sin, Nazxul, and Primordial. After ten years of recording and touring, I put on hold my job as a drummer and decided to start talking to the audience. I'm based in the UK and now I tell jokes around the world.
title: Steve Hughes: Live in Toomler, Amsterdam
